name: Compete 4 Your Seat
tag_list: travel, travel-agent, cheap-airfare, airline-tickets, discounted-airfare, compete
overview:
Travel for less Compete4yourseat.com allows travelers to post their trips for free. Travel Agents bid on your trips enabling you to save money and you have the convience of working with a knowledgable person that will help you find the cheapest airfare.

http://compete4yourseat.com

As one can see from the homepage, the website is very simple to use. For the traveler, all you need to do is put in your trip request which is your departure city and arrival city and the dates that you want to travel. Once you do this, you just click the bottom buttom and you are done, At this point, your trip is sent to a team of travel agents that are waiting for your trip request. Once received, they price it out and send you back an email with the price. If you like it, all you have to do is contact the agent and book your ticket. If you don’t like the price you can also use the live trip search and book your flight directly from the site.

Over 75,000 people have successfully used the site and over 1500 travel agents have signed up.

Compete4yourseat has been featured on FoxTV nationwide, cnbc and was in The New York Times Travel section. Articles have also been published in PC World, Entrepreneur and many more.

Live Trip Search

The website also has a Live Trip Search which allows the customer to purchase tickets immediately without waiting for a bid. The Live trip Search offers customers discount wholesale prices on coach, first, and business class tickets. With over 60 airline contracts, our Live trip Search is able to provide you with deals on domestic and international tickets.
